header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 255-70r17 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire

content.body:
### Shop 255/70R17 Tire Size
255/70R17 tires are often found on light trucks thanks to their larger size. There’s a good chance you have 255/70R17 tires if you drive a Chevrolet Silverado 1500, Ford F-105 STX, and GMC Sierra 150, and a new version of one of these vehicles might roll out of the factory with a set of Bridgestone Dueler H/T 684 II or [General Grabber HTS](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/grabber-hts) tires attached.

Popular vehicles: 

2014-2021 Chevrolet Silverado 1500
2006-2009 Ford F-150 STX
2014-2021 GMC Sierra 1500

All-season tires are the most common tire type thanks to their ability to perform well in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Check out Michelin Defender LTX M/S, [Continental TerrainContact H/T](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/terraincontact-h-t), Firestone Destination LE3, and Kumho Crugen HT51 if you want a set of 255/70R17 tires that performs year-round.

Do you take your Chevrolet Silverado 1500, Ford F-150 STX, or GMC Sierra 1500 off-road from time to time? All-terrain tires are designed to give drivers excellent traction and performance on any terrain, so take a look at the Falken Wildpeak A/T3W, BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2, Toyo Open Country A/T III, and [Yokohama Geolandar AT G015](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-at-g015) if you want a set of 255/70R17 tires that can conquer any terrain.

All-season and all-terrain tires are great for most of the year, but they often struggle to perform on moderate to severe ice, slush, and snow. Consider dedicated winter tires such as the [Bridgestone Blizzak DM-V2](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/blizzak-dm-v2), Michelin Latitude X-Ice Xi2, Firestone Winterforce 2 UV, or Yokohama iceGUARD G075 if you want a set of 255/70R17 tires that can handle winter’s worst weather; just be sure to change your tires once temperatures are consistently above 45 degrees Fahrenheit so that you don’t burn out your winter tires.

Whether you drive a Chevrolet Silverado 1500, Ford F-150 STX, GMC Sierra 1500, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 255/70R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
